Model.Map

Class MapCellTreasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Map.MapCell
      • Model.Map.MapCellTreasure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable, java.io.Serializable

    public class MapCellTreasure
extends MapCell
    This is a map cell treasure class. It inherit map cell. To set the treasure in the map. According to the row and column, put the treasure in the demanded cell.
    See Also:
